0.6.0.en: Added extra the P1 power meter readings via the gateway

0.5.0.en: Added extra thermostat flow cards for changed zone_demand and override_mode, added hidden fan value Away and fixed an issue where room without thermostat was falsy returned

0.4.2.en: fixed several new athom publish rules

0.4.1.en: fixed a bug with actions in flows

0.3.9.en: applied new athom rules for donating

0.3.0.en: implemented refresh functionality; fixed some bugs; Use icons of Itho

0.1.0.en: initial release to control itho fan

0.6.1.en: fixed unit for measure_power, added labels for production

0.6.2.en: implemented new authentication Api, thanks to @peternijssen

0.7.0.en: getting devices via different endpoint, to support setups without spider
